title: Die Linke - Wikipedia
snippet: From 2014 to 2024 the party led a coalition in Thuringia with the Social Democratic Party and The Greens headed by Minister-President Bodo Ramelow. Die Linke is a founding member of the Party of the European Left, and is the fifth-largest party in The Left group in the European Parliament.

title: Left Party | Germany, Politics, Origin, & Election Results | Britannica
snippet: With polling that consistently placed it below the key threshold for Bundestag representation, the party appeared headed for electoral irrelevance, especially after former leader Sahra Wagenknecht split to form the Sahra Wagenknecht Alliance (Bündnis Sahra Wagenknecht; BSW) in 2024.

title: Things to know about the Left Party

title: Are These the Last Days of Die Linke?
snippet: Oskar Lafontaine was already in his early sixties, as was PDS chairman Lothar Bisky, who died in 2013. Gregor Gysi, an icon of national politics for decades and still a moral authority in the party today, was in his late fifties.
